info.title: So Yummy API docs
info.description: The API for the So Yummy project

post.summary: Add own ingredient to user's shopping list.

get.summary: Get list of all categories of recipes.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

get.summary: Get recipe by ID from recipe's list.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

404.description: Recipe with ID was not found

get.summary: Get list of recipes by category's name.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If 'popular' - result is sorted by popularity. By default it's sorted by title

200.description: Return the recipes list by Category's name

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

example.message: Not found recipes by such category

get.summary: Get list of favorite recipes for current user.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If 'popular' - result is sorted by popularity. By default it's sorted by title

200.description: Return the list of favorite recipes

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

get.summary: Get favorite recipe by Id for current user.

200.description: Return true or false by the favorite status of recipe

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

404.description: Recipe with ID was not found

post.summary: Toggle favorite recipe's status by ID.

200.description: Returns recipe's ID and current true favorite status

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

404.description: Recipe with ID was not found

409.description: Recipe with ID was already exists in favorites

example.message: The recipe with id - 640cd5ac2d9fecf12e889864 already exists in favorites of the user with id - 642c18423cafac0ed4f2062f

delete.summary: Remove recipe by ID from favorite list.

200.description: Returns recipe's ID and current false favorite status

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

404.description: Recipe with ID was already delete from favorites

example.message: There is no such recipe with id 640cd5ac2d9fecf12e889864

get.summary: Get list of recipes by title or ingredients.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Recipe's title value or ingredient value

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Recipe's title value or ingredient value

400.description: Incorrect pagination params - type, query, page, perPage

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

example.message: Ingredient abc not found // Recipes with abc not found

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If 'popular' - result is sorted by popularity. By default it's sorted by title

200.description: Return the list of popular recipes

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or empty access token

Image.description: The URL of the image for the ingredient

RecipeID.description: The unique identifier of the recipe

IngredientID.description: The unique identifier of the ingredient

OwnerID.description: The unique identifier of the recipe

SubscribeID.description: The unique identifier of the recipe

RecipeDescription.example: A popular East African snack made with flour, coconut milk, sugar, and spices, fried until golden brown.

RecipeTime.description: The time required to prepare the recipe

RecipePopularity.description: The popularity score of the recipe

RecipeFavorite.description: An array of ingredients needed for the recipe

RecipeLike.description: An array of ingredients needed for the recipe

RecipePreviewImg.description: The URL of the preview image for the recipe

RecipeFullImg.description: The URL of the preview image for the recipe

Instructions.description: The cooking instructions for the recipe
Instructions.example: This is one recipe a lot of people have requested and I have tried to make it as simple as possible.

Description.description: The cooking instructions for the recipe
Description.example: A classic pie with tender chunks of steak.

Thumb.description: The URL of an image of the ingredient.

Youtube.description: The URL of an image of the ingredient.

CreatedAt.description: The URL of an image of the ingredient.

UpdatedAt.description: The URL of an image of the ingredient.

desc.example: A dairy product made from churning cream or milk.

Limit.description: The limit of items in the collection

message.example: Success remove ingredient with id - 642d4c0b84e8c727bbe171fa from shoping list

items.example: Beef, Breakfast, Chicken, Dessert, Goat, Lamb, Miscellaneous, Pasta, Pork, Seafood, Side, Starter, Vegan, Vegetarian

ingridients.description: An array of ingredients needed for the recipe

result.description: Show true or false if recipe is favorite
